Description: NSC 32 + adequate achieve- ment in English and mod- erate achievement level in any three subjects

Qualification: Bachelor of Commerce in Accounting Sciences
Description: NSC 35 + adequate achieve- ment level in English and at least 55% pass in Maths if student does not have Matric Accounting; OR at least 50% pass in Maths if student has done/passed Accounting with at least 60% in Matric
NSC 32 + adequate achieve- ment level in English and Accounting or Mathematics

Qualification: Bachelor of Commerce in Business Information Systems
Description: NSC 32 + adequate achieve- ment level in English and moderate achievement in Mathematics or 75% in Mathematical Literacy and in any two of these sub- jects: Accounting, Busines Studies, Economics and Information Technology or Computer Studies

Qualification: Bachelor of Commerce in Business Management
Description: NSC 32 + adequate achieve- ment level in English and Business Studies plus mod- erate achievement in any two of these subjects: Ac- counting, Economics, In- formation Technology and Mathematics
